text.section: The charge for admission to a place in order to participate in bingo conducted under this part may not exceed $5.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraphs (2) and (3) of this subsection, the value of a prize in money, merchandise, or services for any one game of bingo conducted under this part may not exceed $200.
Jackpot prizes may be offered in a maximum amount of $5,000.
"Winner Take All" games may be offered without a prize limit.

text.section: A licensee's employees and the terms of their employment must be approved by the board before they may conduct bingo under this part.
A minor may not be allowed to participate in bingo conducted under this part.
Bingo may not be conducted under this part in a room or area where alcoholic beverages are sold or served during the game.
A licensee under this part may not conduct bingo on more than 125 days in a year.
